help-file.title: "AWAKEN FOREST"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Summoning
This spell causes the forest to waken and attack the enemies of the Druid. Once roused, the forest will attack ungrouped players in the room, by hitting, bashing and potentially entangling them.
NOTE: "Awaken Forest" can only be cast in areas other than forest if the "Grow" spell has already been cast.
